sentences.english: I cannot overemphasize the psychological trauma to these people.
sentences.chinese: 我無法更加強強調他們所受的心理創傷。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to use spine immobilization techniques in trauma victims.
sentences.chinese: 有能在創傷患者身上使用脊椎板固定技巧。

sentences.english: Many people traumatized by what they had experienced.
sentences.chinese: 多人因這次經歷受到創傷。

sentences.english: Can I call back yesterday's wound and make them whole?
sentences.chinese: 我能扶平昨日的創傷嗎？
時間能醫治所有的創傷。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to direct pediatric trauma resuscitations.
sentences.chinese: 有能處小兒科創傷的救護。

sentences.english: We describe a case of a traumatic avulsion fracture of the distal phalanx of the hallux.
sentences.chinese: 我們描述了一對拇末節撕脫骨折創傷的情況。

sentences.english: Conclusion Sliding graft was a safe and effective method in treating traumatic tibia nonunion.
sentences.chinese: 結論滑動植骨是治療創傷後脛骨幹骨不連的有效方法。

sentences.english: Liver fibrosis is a wound healing process characterized by accumulation of extracellular matrix proteins.
sentences.chinese: 外基質沉積爲特徵的創傷癒合過程。

sentences.english: It sounds like this dog was traumatized from the experience of extreme stress and fear, " Saul said.
sentences.chinese: 聽上去這隻狗的創傷是由於經歷了極度壓力和恐懼。

sentences.english: The disagreement left deep wounds that only time may heal.
sentences.chinese: 意見分歧已留下深深的傷痕，只有時間來醫治創傷了。

sentences.english: And know that I had my wounds and also my healing. 3 B.
sentences.chinese: 我的許多創傷，但也有我的醫治的法兒。

sentences.english: It reviewed the progress on etiopathogenisis of non-traumatic rhabdomyolysis (NRML) patients and their nursing.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了非創傷性橫紋肌溶解症的病因及護理進展。

sentences.english: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
sentences.chinese: 醫治愛的創傷惟有更加地去愛。

sentences.english: Conclusion Integrative therapy should be taken for traumatic flail chest.

sentences.english: Vibrio vulnificus can cause wound or soft tissue infections.
sentences.chinese: 創傷弧菌可引致傷口或軟組織感染。
